code: import React,{useState}from'react';import api from'../api/axios-config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddProduct=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[price,setPrice]=useState('');const[stock,setStock]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await api.post('/add-product',{name,description,price:parseFloat(price),stock:parseInt(stock)});setMessage(response.data.message);setName('');setDescription('');setPrice('');setStock('');}catch(error){setMessage('Erro ao adicionar produto.');console.error(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Adicionar Produto"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Nome",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Descri\xE7\xE3o",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Pre\xE7o",value:price,onChange:e=>setPrice(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Estoque",value:stock,onChange:e=>setStock(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Adicionar"})]})]});};export default AddProduct;
